article.title: Transmuted Gravity Wave Signals from Primordial Black Holes

multiple_choice_question.text: Which statement best describes the parameter space indicated by the black curve in Figure 1?
choices: PBHs within this parameter space are ruled out as a significant contributor to dark matter.
PBHs within this parameter space would produce a detectable stochastic gravitational wave background within one year of observation.
PBHs within this parameter space would produce one or more transmuted gravitational wave signals detectable by aLIGO-VIRGO per year.
PBHs within this parameter space would be detectable via micro-lensing surveys like Subaru HSC.
